name: re:ORBITAL
description: reOrbital is building the world's fastest, most cost effective orbital tech maturation platform. Our flagship product, the TACT-100,  is an orbital tech maturation platform designed to fly on reusable upper-stage vehicles throughout launch, in-orbit operations, reentry, and landing.
one_liner: reOrbital is building the world's fastest, most cost effective orbital tech maturation platform. Our flagship product, the TACT-100,  is an orbital tech maturation platform designed to fly on reusable upper-stage vehicles throughout launch, in-orbit operations, reentry, and landing.
